name: merge-reports

schema.title: Schema for Playwright Merge Reports Executor
schema.description: Merge Playwright blob reports to produce unified reports for the configured reporters (excluding the `blob` reporter).

config.description: The Playwright configuration file path. Relative to the project root.

expectedSuites.description: The expected number of test suites to produce a report.

description: Merge Playwright blob reports to produce unified reports for the configured reporters (excluding the `blob` reporter).
